column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While I don't think that this place (or really any other place
column2: when there are so many great options in Chicago) is worth a 3-hour wait
column3: we had some pretty tasty fare - some of the tapas we tried were the brussels sprout salad
column5: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column7: and the chicken paella. All were good
column8: but I especially enjoyed the brussels sprout salad and goat cheese. I wasn't a fan of the chicken paella
column9: but my husband really liked it. FYI
column10: you have to order a minimum of 2 servings of paella and that was more than enough - 2 servings is a HUGE portion. We definitely had to box some of the paella up to take with us.
